title: Why you can’t trust this rally…
itunes:title: Why you can’t trust this rally…
description: My awful experience buying a new car and what it says about the general economy… Why I don’t expect the latest market rally to last… And how to make a fortune from market crashes. In this episode   A rant about buying a car [0:30] Our “car salesmen” economy [12:00]  Why I don’t trust this market rally [19:10]  What the Fed should do to preserve it [30:10] How to make a fortune during a market crash [35:34]  Enjoyed this episode?
